name: Another World (itch) (EmperorTamarin)
description:
A game made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1, by Emperor Tamarin (first ever game jam).

Press F to switch between real and VR worlds, and try to fight off enemies in both worlds.

WASD to move. Space to jump. Left Click to attack.

Disclaimer: This was my first game jam. The game is most likely buggy and breaks easily.

Enjoy!
